original_text: Letters were sent to all the Jews, to the 127 provinces of the kingdom of Ahasuerus, in words of peace and truth,
korean_text: 화평하고 진실한 말로 편지를 써서 아하수에로의 나라 백이십칠 지방에 있는 유다 모든 사람에게 보내어

sentences.original_text: Letters were sent to all the Jews,
to the 127 provinces of the kingdom of Ahasuerus,
in words of peace and truth,
